channel.title: Comments on: Selective mutism in teenage. Building self-esteem, with help from Katherine Whitehorn and Reina del Cid
channel.description: Supporting children's language, communication and learning

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Well there's a lovely surprise!!!! Great lyrics. Really powerful, but in general SM is not like that. Still, it's great that a singer can start to explore childhood and teenage 'internal life' in such a powerful way. Hope you are well too!!! Michael
item.content:encoded:
Well there’s a lovely surprise!!!!
Great lyrics. Really powerful, but in general SM is not like that. Still, it’s great that a singer can start to explore childhood and teenage ‘internal life’ in such a powerful way.
Hope you are well too!!!
Michael

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Thanks Simon! I spent hours in my room as a teenager. It wasn't a happy time, but I read loads (NME and Agatha Christie mainly!) and wrote lots of letters and even short stories. Next post will be about reality TV and the amazing 'UP!' Series
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Simon! I spent hours in my room as a teenager. It wasn’t a happy time, but I read loads (NME and Agatha Christie mainly!) and wrote lots of letters and even short stories.
Next post will be about reality TV and the amazing ‘UP!’ Series

item.title: By: simon marley
item.dc:creator: simon marley
item.description: As ever,very insightful Michael. Many youngsters and their families will benefit from your thoughts and work.
item.content:encoded: As ever,very insightful Michael. Many youngsters and their families will benefit from your thoughts and work.

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma
item.description: Hi Michael hope you are well? This was another interesting read. Look out for th song Mariella by Kate Nash I think you would enjoy it! Hopefully we will catch up soon.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Michael hope you are well? This was another interesting read. Look out for th song Mariella by Kate Nash I think you would enjoy it!
Hopefully we will catch up soon.
